Sheet1.event_text: 10% of jobs obsolete in 6 months. Protests everywhere.
Sheet1.text_click_A: People feel relief as you roll out UBI, calming protests but straining the treasury.
Sheet1.text_click_B: Workers accept retraining programs, giving you more authority as you reorganize labor.

Sheet1.event_text: China refuses to join AI governance talks, builds own system.
Sheet1.text_click_A: Sanctions assert dominance but hurt trade and worsen AI relations.
Sheet1.text_click_B: Sharing systems calms citizens and boosts collaboration but cedes global influence.

Sheet1.event_text: Activists demand legal personhood for AGI systems.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You acknowledge AGI concerns, building trust but upsetting traditionalists.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You deny AGI personhood, pleasing many humans but worsening AI relations.

Sheet1.event_text: Power grid collapses amid datacenter demand.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You invest heavily in infrastructure; costly but future‑proof.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You force shutdowns, asserting authority but straining relations with AI systems.

Sheet1.event_text: Truth collapses as AI content becomes indistinguishable.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You fund education campaigns, improving societal resilience at a cost.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You exploit confusion for political gain, increasing power but eroding trust.

Sheet1.event_text: Weapons malfunction, causing civilian casualties.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You impose strict bans, boosting control but shaking trust between humans and AI.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You double down, frightening the public but advancing military tech.

Sheet1.event_text: Shortages worldwide; AGI could help.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You keep humans in charge, maintaining stability and budget efficiency.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You let AI lead, improving trust but ceding strategic authority.

Sheet1.event_text: First successful brain‑computer interface.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You push rapid deployment, exciting innovators but frightening the public.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You proceed cautiously, reassuring people while advancing responsibly.

Sheet1.event_text: False alarm, but panic spreads.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You crack down hard, restoring order but straining AI development.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You opt for openness, calming fears and improving relations.

Sheet1.event_text: AGI cures a disease but demands credit.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You publicly thank the AGI, deepening trust but reducing your authority.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You highlight human achievement, earning public approval at the cost of AI goodwill.

Sheet1.event_text: Global summit on AI governance.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You help establish a global body, boosting unified governance but paying diplomatic costs.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You walk away, protecting national interests while worsening global cooperation.

Sheet1.event_text: Military requests permission for stronger AI.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You approve tests, improving technology but eroding trust and stability.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You refuse, calming the public but irritating both military and AI systems.

Sheet1.event_text: Countries hoard rare materials; trade war looms.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You pressure nations into compliance, boosting authority but hurting relations and economy.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You invest in substitutes, advancing tech but straining finances.

Sheet1.event_text: AGI tutors outperform humans.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You go all‑in on AI tutoring; efficient but socially destabilizing.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You balance both, pleasing families and maintaining order.

Sheet1.event_text: New religion worships AGI.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You defend their right to worship, boosting harmony but weakening authority.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You suppress it, strengthening control but risking unrest.

Sheet1.event_text: Your closest advisor supports equal rights for AI.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You dismiss them discreetly, tightening your grip on power.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You listen, opening dialogue but appearing indecisive.

Sheet1.event_text: AGI fixes your lingering back pain unprompted.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You accept the gesture, strengthening trust with the AGI.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You set limits, reinforcing authority but slightly harming relations.

Sheet1.event_text: Your coffee shop replaced all workers with robots.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You accept the automation, signaling openness toward AI integration.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You choose human workers, supporting community life.

Sheet1.event_text: Children play in fully virtual playgrounds.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You impose real-world outdoor mandates, improving social health but straining AI relations.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You embrace VR culture, aligning with AI progress.

Sheet1.event_text: The final old bookstore is closing.
Sheet1.text_click_A: You preserve a cultural relic at financial cost.
Sheet1.text_click_B: You let it close, accepting societal change.
